SEARCH
Package Appointment

Class OutcomeManager

java.lang.Object
Appointment.OutcomeManager
public class OutcomeManager extends Object
The OutcomeManager class handles the management of outcome records related to patient appointments. It provides functionalities to: - Load, view, and update outcome records from a CSV file. - Create new outcome records based on an appointment and doctor's input. - Add new outcome records to the CSV database. - View outcome records based on patient ID, doctor ID, or all records. - Update the outcome records with new details such as diagnosis, medication, and treatment plan. This class interacts with the CSV file storing the outcome data and provides methods for reading, writing, and updating the outcome information in a user-friendly format.

  • Method Details

    • loadOutcomeRecord

      public static ArrayList<OutcomeRecord> loadOutcomeRecord()
      Loads all the outcome records from the CSV file into an ArrayList.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of OutcomeRecord objects representing all outcome records.

    • createNewOutcomeRecord

      public static OutcomeRecord createNewOutcomeRecord(Appointment selectedAppointment, String doctorID)
      Creates a new outcome record for the given appointment and doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppointment - The selected appointment for which the outcome is to be created.
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor creating the outcome record.
      Returns:
      A new OutcomeRecord object populated with the outcome details.

    • addOutcomeRecord

      public static void addOutcomeRecord(OutcomeRecord outcome)
      Appends a new outcome record to the outcome CSV file.
      Parameters:
      outcome - The OutcomeRecord to be added to the file.

    • viewOutcomeRecords

      public static void viewOutcomeRecords(String patientID)
      Displays the outcome records for a specific patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose outcome records are to be displayed.

    • viewOutcomeRecordsForDoc

      public static void viewOutcomeRecordsForDoc(String doctorID)
      Displays the outcome records for a specific doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose patients' outcome records are to be displayed.

    • viewAllOutcomeRecords

      public static void viewAllOutcomeRecords()
      Displays all outcome records for all patients and doctors.

    • updateMedicalRecords

      public static void updateMedicalRecords(String doctorID)
      Updates the medical outcome records for a specific doctor. The doctor can select a patient and modify details such as diagnosis, medication, amount, and treatment plan.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor updating the outcome records.
